channel.title: Font messed up in Iceweasel Whonix
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I have an ASUS Zenbook UX301 with QuadHD 3200 x 1800 resolution. After launching Whonix in Virtualbox the font in the OS become messed up and I have to resize the OS font. The OS font is all good after I resized it, but on Iceweasel it's still messed up like in this pic:
http://i.imgur.com/GcmL2Wc.jpg
On Tor browser it also messed up and not displaying web pages in the correct style. Does anyone have a solution for this problem? Will be much appreciated, I really love Whonix.
Thank you
